mapper.select: SELECT vd.id , vd.vd_name as "vdName" , vd.resource_id as "resourceId" , vd.remark , vd.status , vd.vd_type_id as "vdTypeId" , vd.vd_sub_type_id as "vdSubTypeId" , vt.vd_type as "vdTypeName" , vst.vd_sub_type as "vdSubTypeIdName" FROM vd as vd inner join vd_type vt on vt.id = vd.vd_type_id inner join vd_sub_type vst on vst.id = vd.vd_sub_type_id where vd.status != #{status} order by vd.id DESC;
